labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The "Light" checkbox is missing a checkmark.
data.expected_result: The "Light" checkbox has a checkmark in it when selected.
data.short_description: Light theme checkbox doesn't have a checkmark
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch your theme to Light, or if you're already using Light, look at the checkbox in the Appearance settings menu.
